item.title: The shared database problem
item.description: The Problem You’ve been asked to write a service that requires some information from one or multiple databases, accessing a database is easy, and writting some SQL is fast, I can do that! The problem comes when you have multiple applications and services accesing databases, and the schema of a table in the database changes, things get broken! Have you seen a place where nobody wants to change a table in the data warehouse because they don’t know what will fail?
